metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14941 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Jaspersoft JasperReports 4.7 suffers from a saved credential disclosure vulnerability, which allows a remote authenticated user to retrieve stored Data Source passwords by accessing flow.html and reading the HTML source code of the page reached in an Edit action for a Data Source connector.

criterions.comment: jasperreports package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
